name: Split Address
introductoryText:
Splits an address field into streetname, streetnumber, and suffix.
An address is not expected to contain zip codes, city names or country names.
Some examples of valid input patterns:

- Baker Street 221B
- Baker Street 221 B
- Baker Street 221-B
- Baker Street, 221 B
- Baker Street 221 Apt B
- 221B, Baker Street
- 221 B, Baker Street
- 221 Apt B, Baker Street
- 221 Baker Street

options.name: address
options.title: Address
options.description: Name of the input field containing the address

options.name: streetname
options.title: Streetname
options.description: Name of the output field containing the streetname

options.name: streetnumber
options.title: Streetnumber
options.description: Name of the output field containing the streetnumber

options.name: suffix
options.title: Suffix
options.description: Name of the output field containing the suffix
